scripts.build: cross-env DISABLE_CLIENT_STATS=true METEOR_DISABLE_OPTIMISTIC_CACHING=1 TOOL_NODE_FLAGS=--max-old-space-size=4096 meteor build --architecture=os.linux.x86_64 --server-only ./build
